job.description: We are currently accepting resumes for a ServiceNowATF Developer in Columbus OHltbrgtltbrgtRequired Skills and Experienceltbrgtltbrgt Bachelors degree in computer science management information science or related fieldltbrgt68 years experienceltbrgt ltbrgtServiceNow Developer skillset Flow designer Service PortalCSMltbrgtATF Developer  all the above plus ATFltbrgtltbrgtMust have a strong CSM and Service Portal skillsetltbrgtServiceNow Contractor with Specialty experience with Customer Service Mgmt CSM ModuleltbrgtExperience and knowledge of CSM and how it interacts with platform modulesltbrgtAngular JavascriptltbrgtCSMltbrgtCSM Portal external and internalltbrgtAgent WorkspaceltbrgtMajor CaseltbrgtNatural LanguageltbrgtCustomer MobileltbrgtService CatalogService RequestltbrgtltbrgtUNICON International Inc is an Equal Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtIf you are interested in working for an organization where honesty integrity and quality are among the core principles then click apply todayltbrgtltbrgtKeywords ServiceNow ATF CSM Angular Javascript Agent Workspace Major Case Natural Language Customer Mobile Service CatalogService Request
